name: rice production, non-basmati | rice, non-basmati | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19924/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of rice (fresh matter). The yield is 6856 kg/ha at a moisture content at storage of 13%.;;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.];[This dataset is meant to replace the following datasets:; - rice production, US, 2001 - 2006 (6a5858d2-8336-4327-b62a-f6b8030ea61d)]

This activity starts after the harvest of the previous crop. The inputs of seeds, mineral fertilisers, pesticides and irrigation water are considered. It is assumed that no organic fertilisers are applied.


The dataset includes all machine operations and corresponding machine infrastructure and sheds. Machine operations are: soil cultivation, sowing, fertilisation, irrigation, weed control, pest and pathogen control, combine-harvest, and drying of grains. Further, direct field emissions are included. This activity ends after harvest and drying of grains at the farm gate.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0112:Growing of rice

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The yield data have been collected for the years 2001-2006.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Refers to an average production in the USA
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Conventional production typical for the country. Water for irrigation is pumped from 48 meter depth by electric pumps.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data come from the NREL database and from varoius U.S database. Data were compiled from statistics, literature, farm survey reports, documents from extension services, and expert knowledge.

The exchange has been updated from 'ammonium nitrate, as N' into 'ammonium nitrate' and therefore its amount has been scaled (multiplied) from 0.0055 kg by 2.8573 kg of 'ammonium nitrate' per kg of 'ammonium nitrate, as N'. Original comment of the exchange is: See chapter 'Yields and Inputs of Arable Crop Production' in "01_crop production - yields & inputs US_v1.0.pdf" - pdf-document on the dedicated talk page of ecoinvent (www.ecoinvent.org/documentation)
